title: I can't be the only one who thinks Ninja Tabi are OP

replies.body: Not even close. It is one of the few ways to counter AD hypercarries and to bully people like Riven

> [{quoted}](name=Arya Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MUEMqVvJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-20T20:27:26.507+0000)
>
> Not even close. It is one of the few ways to counter AD hypercarries and to bully people like Riven

Well Riven is pretty broken right now so if it turns around and bullies her it has to be a damn good item.

Riven is above average right now, let us not over exaggerate. She is T1 not God Tier in soloQ and hasn't seen much professional play in a season or two.

It is a solid item vs AD, just as Mercs is a solid item vs AP.
